title: New: Family History – In Need (Demo)
body:
Some tracks are just made for the live stage.

Take one listen to [**Family History’s**](http://www.facebook.com/familyhistorymusicuk) _In Need_, and try telling me that you can’t imagine them enchanting a couple of hundred people in a sweaty, claustrophobic venue, whilst strobe lights flash in time with the delirious synths. Based around a simple chord progression and **LCD Soundsystem’s** guide to writing electro-pop classics, there’s a level of understanding found on _In Need_ that’s warmly refreshing. “_All your friends are getting married and carried away”_ laments the lead singer in a respectably honest fashion. Dance your heart out kid.
